price: Patnja će mu na onom svijetu udvostručena biti i vječno će u njoj ponižen ostati.
arabic: يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخۡلُدۡ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yuḍāʿaf lahu al-ʿadhābu yawma al-qiyāmati wayakhlud fīhi muhānan
